item.title: STOR 831 Fall 2017 Schedule
item.description: Semester: Fall 2017 Instructor: Shankar Bhamidi See the course syllabus for more information. See the following for template of Lecture: Latex code of Sample and corresponding compiled pdf of Sample. Course Material Date of Lecture Material covered Notes Scribe August 22 Motivation Pages 1-9H of Lecture 1, Advice to graduate students Scribe August 24 Basic metric space theory Pages 9I - 1.
